Attacks.Name: Poison Jab
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, Nidoqueen gains power equal to the damage dealt. Wild: The target gains the Poison special condition.

Attacks.Name: Earth Power
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled, the target gains the Stun special condition, and enemy characters within Range 2 of the target suffer 1 damage.

Attacks.Name: Body Slam
Attacks.Effect: If this attack deals damage, the target gains the Stagger special condition and is Pushed S.

Superpowers.Name: Sheer Force
Superpowers.Effect: When making an attack, Nidoqueen may reroll up to two attack dice. If it does, it cannot trigger special effects on wilds for that attack.

Superpowers.Name: Defensive Stance
Superpowers.Effect: Until the start of its next activation, Nidoqueen adds 1 die to its defense rolls and gains immunity to the Stagger condition.

Superpowers.Name: Toxic Spikes
Superpowers.Effect: Place a Toxic Spike marker within Range 3. If an enemy character ends a movement action within Range 1 of the marker, it gains the Poison special condition.

Attacks.Name: Earthquake
Attacks.Effect: All characters, including allies, within Range 2 suffer damage. Wild: Enemy characters gain the Stun special condition.

Superpowers.Name: Venomous Burst
Superpowers.Effect: Enemy characters within Range 2 of Nidoqueen suffer 1 damage and gain the Poison special condition.
